entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Amos
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -10.7°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
